newsitem.title: YUGOSLAVIA: Yugoslav September inflation 1.2 pct vs 2.3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Yugoslav September inflation 1.2 pct vs 2.3 pct.

text.p: The Federal Statistical Office reported the following economic indicator details.
NOTES -- Figures refer to rump Federal Republic of Yugoslavia, comprising Serbia and Montenegro.
The National Bank of Yugoslavia imposed a stabilisation programme on January 24, 1994, halting hyperinflation of 60 percent per day.
